page.title: 15LIFESTYLE
page.content: I LIKE LIVING IN MY VILLAGE BECAUSE THERE'S A LOT TO DO.ON MONDAY I GO TO BROWNIES WHERE WE EARN BADGES FOR COOKING,SWIMMING,COLLECTING THINGS ETC.WE HAVE BEEN TO BRISTOL ZOO AND WE GO FOR WALKS. ON TUESDAYS I GO TO ST JOHN'S AMBULANCE CLASSES WHERE WE LEARN TO GIVE FIRST AID. ON WEDNESDAYS I GO TO PIANO LESSONS.MY FAVOURITE PIECE IS CRUNCHY FLAKES. SOMETIMES I GO TO THE PARK WITH MY FRIENDS WHERE WE PLAY HIDE AND SEEK AND HOP SCOTCH. ON FRIDAYS I VISIT MY GRANNY. SOMETIMES I HELP MY MOTHER TO TIDY UP AND WASH DISHES. I WATCH TELEVISION WHEN ITS RAINING. THE PROGRAMME I ENJOY MOST IS 'THAT'S MY BOY.'I READ QUITE A LOT AND THE BOOK I ENJOY BEST IS'SUPERGRAN'BY FOREST WILSON.
